thread.section_title: DriveAway Holidays New Zealand Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DriveAway Holidays New Zealand | driveaway.co.nz
thread.title: ROBERT and HELENA
thread.title_full: DriveAway Holidays New Zealand reviewed by ROBERT and HELENA

author: ROBERT and HELENA
title: ROBERT and HELENA
text:
We had so many questions and so many options to consider for our road trip but the staff were so helpful and patient and friendly it actually made the whole procedure enjoyable!
We would unreservedly recommend this company to anyone needing rental cars for their holiday.
We had rung various other companies and searched online and DriveAway Holidays provided the best deal.We felt it was the best way to organize a rental as we had so many variables that to be able to have the staff discuss options and give rates and help us be aware of all extra costs and insurances was wonderful.We felt confident after all the negotiating to book and pay over the phone - receiving confirmation and emails immediately. So thank you DriveAwayHolidays NZ!!
